benchmark_details.name: LCStep
benchmark_details.overview: LCStep is a novel procedural knowledge dataset created from LangChain tutorials, designed to test systemsâ€™ domain adaptation ability in procedural question answering tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To test systems' ability to perform procedural question answering using new procedural knowledge.

data.source: Collected from 180 tutorial pages of the LangChain website.
data.annotation: LLM-enabled pipeline with human oversight and quality review.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on evaluations comparing the AAG system against baseline methods.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score indicates better performance in producing coherent and plausible procedural steps.
methodology.baseline_results: AAG outperforms baselines including Zero-Shot, Few-Shot, RAG, and ReAct.
methodology.validation: The system's performance was validated through ablation studies on its various components.
